languages.text: {n}Человек в балахоне, сгорбившись над передатчиком, монотонно, но прочувствованно бормочет в вокс-уловитель, слегка раскачиваясь:{/n} "Изможденный Император-Пращур наш обретается под светом далеких звезд. Он грезит о нас и шлет нам частицы света Своего. Тело Его страдает, но Он не перестает мыслить о нас. Накормим же Его светом душ своих, молитвами нашими, верой нашей".

{n}Hunched over the vox-caster, the hooded man mutters monotonously but emphatically into the machine as he rocks slightly to and fro,{/n} "In the light of distant stars our Emperor-Progenitor wanders wearily. With thoughts and visions of us, He sends us particles of His light. Though His body suffers, His mind lingers on us. Let us therefore nourish Him with the light of our souls, with our prayers, with our faith."
languages.original_text: {n}Человек в балахоне, сгорбившись над передатчиком, монотонно, но прочувствованно бормочет в вокс-уловитель, слегка раскачиваясь:{/n} "Изможденный Император-Пращур наш обретается под светом далеких звезд. Он грезит о нас и шлет нам частицы света Своего. Тело Его страдает, но Он не перестает мыслить о нас. Накормим же Его светом душ своих, молитвами нашими, верой нашей".

Let us therefore nourish Him with the light of our souls, with our prayers, with our faith."

languages.text: {n}Encorvado sobre el voco amplificador, el hombre encapuchado murmura de forma monótona y enfática a la máquina y se mece.{/n} «Nuestro Emperador-Progenitor vaga cansado por la luz de las estrellas lejanas. Mediante pensamientos y visiones nos envía partículas de su luz. Aunque su cuerpo sufre, su mente no nos abandona. Por eso debemos nutrirle con la luz de nuestras almas, con nuestras oraciones y con nuestra fe».
languages.original_text: {n}Hunched over the vox-caster, the hooded man mutters monotonously but emphatically into the machine as he rocks slightly to and fro,{/n} "In the light of distant stars our Emperor-Progenitor wanders wearily. With thoughts and visions of us, He sends us particles of His light. Though His body suffers, His mind lingers on us. Let us therefore nourish Him with the light of our souls, with our prayers, with our faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}Encorvado sobre el voco amplificador, el hombre encapuchado murmura de forma monótona y enfática a la máquina y se mece.{/n} «Nuestro Emperador-Progenitor vaga cansado por la luz de las estrellas lejanas. Mediante pensamientos y visiones nos envía partículas de su luz. Aunque su cuerpo sufre, su mente no nos abandona. Por eso debemos nutrirle con la luz de nuestras almas, con nuestras oraciones y con nuestra fe».

languages.text: {n}戴着兜帽的人蜷缩在通讯器上方，身体微微摇晃着，对着麦克风开了口。他的语调毫无起伏，但吐字很重。{/n}“在遥远的星光下，元祖神皇疲惫地游荡着。祂带着对我们的关切与愿景，将祂的明光赐予我们。尽管祂的身体苦痛不堪，但祂的思想与我们同在。因此，请让我们用灵魂之光，用我们的祈祷与信仰来滋养祂吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hunched over the vox-caster, the hooded man mutters monotonously but emphatically into the microphone as he rocks slightly to and fro,{/n} "In the light of distant stars our Emperor-Progenitor wanders wearily. With thoughts and visions of us, He sends us particles of His light. Though His body suffers, His mind lingers on us. Let us therefore nourish Him with the light of our souls, with our prayers, with our faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}戴着兜帽的人蜷缩在通讯器上方，身体微微摇晃着，对着麦克风开了口。他的语调毫无起伏，但吐字很重。{/n}“在遥远的星光下，元祖神皇疲惫地游荡着。祂带着对我们的关切与愿景，将祂的明光赐予我们。尽管祂的身体苦痛不堪，但祂的思想与我们同在。因此，请让我们用灵魂之光，用我们的祈祷与信仰来滋养祂吧。”

languages.text: {n}音声通信送受信装置に覆い被さるようにかがんだフードの男は、わずかにユラユラと揺れ、一本調子だが力強く、マイクに何かを呟いている。{/n}「遠い星の光の中で、我らが始祖なる皇帝は疲れ彷徨う。我々の思考とビジョンを使って、あのお方はその光の粒子を送ってくださる。あのお方の体は悲鳴をあげているが、その心は我々の中にある。故に我々の魂の光、祈り、そして信仰で、あのお方を育むのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Hunched over the vox-caster, the hooded man mutters monotonously but emphatically into the microphone as he rocks slightly to and fro,{/n} "In the light of distant stars our Emperor-Progenitor wanders wearily. With thoughts and visions of us, He sends us particles of His light. Though His body suffers, His mind lingers on us. Let us therefore nourish Him with the light of our souls, with our prayers, with our faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}音声通信送受信装置に覆い被さるようにかがんだフードの男は、わずかにユラユラと揺れ、一本調子だが力強く、マイクに何かを呟いている。{/n}「遠い星の光の中で、我らが始祖なる皇帝は疲れ彷徨う。我々の思考とビジョンを使って、あのお方はその光の粒子を送ってくださる。あのお方の体は悲鳴をあげているが、その心は我々の中にある。故に我々の魂の光、祈り、そして信仰で、あのお方を育むのだ」

languages.text: {n}Über den Vox-Transmitter gebeugt, murmelt der Mann mit der Kapuze monoton, aber nachdrücklich etwas in das Mikrofon, während er leicht vor- und zurückwippt.{/n} "Im Licht entfernter Sterne wandert müde unser Imperator-Progenitor. Ohne Gedanken und Visionen von uns schickt er uns Partikel seines Lichts. Obschon sein Körper leidet, verweilt sein Geist bei uns. Lasst uns ihn darum nähren mit dem Licht unserer Seelen, mit unseren Gebeten, mit unserem Glauben."
languages.original_text: {n}Hunched over the vox-caster, the hooded man mutters monotonously but emphatically into the microphone as he rocks slightly to and fro,{/n} "In the light of distant stars our Emperor-Progenitor wanders wearily. With thoughts and visions of us, He sends us particles of His light. Though His body suffers, His mind lingers on us. Let us therefore nourish Him with the light of our souls, with our prayers, with our faith."

Lasst uns ihn darum nähren mit dem Licht unserer Seelen, mit unseren Gebeten, mit unserem Glauben."

languages.text: {n}Penché sur l'émetteur vox, l'homme encapuchonné marmonne dans le micro d'une voix à la fois monotone et véhémente en se balançant d'avant en arrière :{/n} « Notre Empereur-Géniteur erre avec lassitude dans la lumière d'étoiles lointaines. Il nous envoie des particules de Sa lumière, à nous qui l'accompagnons dans Ses pensées et Ses visions. Malgré la souffrance qui assaille Son corps, Il nous garde constamment dans son esprit. Nourrissons-le donc de la lumière de nos âmes, de nos prières, de notre foi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hunched over the vox-caster, the hooded man mutters monotonously but emphatically into the microphone as he rocks slightly to and fro,{/n} "In the light of distant stars our Emperor-Progenitor wanders wearily. With thoughts and visions of us, He sends us particles of His light. Though His body suffers, His mind lingers on us. Let us therefore nourish Him with the light of our souls, with our prayers, with our faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}Penché sur l'émetteur-vox, l'homme encapuchonné marmonne dans le micro d'une voix à la fois monotone et véhémente en se balançant d'avant en arrière :{/n} « Notre Empereur-Géniteur erre avec lassitude dans la lumière d'étoiles lointaines. Il nous envoie des particules de Sa lumière, à nous qui l'accompagnons dans Ses pensées et Ses visions. Malgré la souffrance qui assaille Son corps, Il nous garde constamment dans son esprit. Nourrissons-le donc de la lumière de nos âmes, de nos prières, de notre foi. »

languages.text: {n}Voksyayara doğru eğilen kukuletalı adam, tekdüze ancak sempati dolu bir sesle makineye doğru mırıldanırken bir ileri bir geri sallanıyor.{/n} "Uzak yıldızların ışığı altında Ata İmparator'umuz yorgun argın seyahatini sürdürüyor. Düşüncelerini ve görülerini biz işgal ederken ışığının zerrelerini bizimle paylaşıyor. Bedeni acı çekse de zihni bizi düşünmeye devam ediyor. Ruhlarımızın ışığı, dualarımız ve inancımızla O'nu besleyip güç aşılayalım."
languages.original_text: {n}Hunched over the vox-caster, the hooded man mutters monotonously but emphatically into the machine as he rocks slightly to and fro,{/n} "In the light of distant stars our Emperor-Progenitor wanders wearily. With thoughts and visions of us, He sends us particles of His light. Though His body suffers, His mind lingers on us. Let us therefore nourish Him with the light of our souls, with our prayers, with our faith."
